trans-unit.resname: MKC·19 | Case of the Shifting Visage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Case of the Shifting Visage
trans-unit.target: 幻变外貌案
trans-unit.note: 卡洛夫庄园谋杀案指挥官系列没有发行中文指挥官套牌产品，因而中文版不存在常规版本的新牌张，而只有扩画版本（它们出现在卡洛夫庄园谋杀案主系列的聚珍补充包中）。但案件牌因为牌框原因没有扩画版本，也就没有中文版本的实卡存在，中文翻译只存在于本系列的发布释疑中。

trans-unit.resname: MKC·19 | Case of the Shifting Visage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, surveil 1.\nTo solve — There are fifteen or more cards in your graveyard. (If unsolved, solve at the beginning of your end step.)\nSolved — Whenever you cast a nonlegendary creature spell, copy that spell. (The copy becomes a token.)
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，刺探1。 侦办～你的坟墓场中有十五张或更多牌。（若本案未侦结，则在你的结束步骤开始时侦办。） 侦结～每当你施放非传奇的生物咒语时，复制该咒语。（所成之复制品会成为衍生物。）
trans-unit.note: 卡洛夫庄园谋杀案指挥官系列没有发行中文指挥官套牌产品，因而中文版不存在常规版本的新牌张，而只有扩画版本（它们出现在卡洛夫庄园谋杀案主系列的聚珍补充包中）。但案件牌因为牌框原因没有扩画版本，也就没有中文版本的实卡存在，中文翻译只存在于本系列的发布释疑中。

trans-unit.resname: MKC·312 | Duskana, the Rage Mother | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Duskana, the Rage Mother
trans-unit.target: 狂怒熊母杜卡娜

trans-unit.resname: MKC·312 | Duskana, the Rage Mother | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw a card for each creature you control with base power and toughness 2/2.\nWhenever a creature you control with base power and toughness 2/2 attacks, it gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你每操控一个基础力量与防御力为2/2的生物，便抓一张牌。 每当一个由你操控且基础力量与防御力为2/2的生物攻击时，它得+3/+3直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MKC·312 | Duskana, the Rage Mother | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "A pale bear shall herald the rise of the old gods."\n—Gruul prophecy
trans-unit.target: 「白熊现世，预示古神崛起。」 ～古鲁预言

trans-unit.resname: MKC·313 | Feather, Radiant Arbiter | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Feather, Radiant Arbiter
trans-unit.target: 辉光仲裁使飞羽

trans-unit.resname: MKC·313 | Feather, Radiant Arbiter | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying, lifelink\nWhenever you cast a noncreature spell that targets only CARDNAME, you may choose any number of other creatures that spell could target and pay {2} for each of those creatures. If you do, for each of those creatures, copy that spell. The copy targets that creature.
trans-unit.target: 飞行，系命 每当你施放仅以CARDNAME为目标的非生物咒语时，你可以选择任意数量该咒语能指定为目标的其他生物并为每个此类生物各支付{2}。若你如此作，则每有一个此类生物，便复制一次该咒语，此复制品以该生物为目标。

trans-unit.resname: MKC·314 | Kaust, Eyes of the Glade | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kaust, Eyes of the Glade
trans-unit.target: 林地之眼寇斯特

trans-unit.resname: MKC·314 | Kaust, Eyes of the Glade | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control that was turned face up this turn deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.\n{T}: Turn target face-down attacking creature you control face up.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控且为本回合中翻回正面的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，抓一张牌。 {T}：将目标由你操控、牌面朝下且正进行攻击的生物翻回正面。

trans-unit.resname: MKC·314 | Kaust, Eyes of the Glade | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: If you think you're being watched, you're probably right.
trans-unit.target: 如果你觉得有眼睛盯着你，那大概不是错觉。

trans-unit.resname: MKC·315 | Marvo, Deep Operative | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Marvo, Deep Operative
trans-unit.target: 深洋密探玛沃

trans-unit.resname: MKC·315 | Marvo, Deep Operative | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, clash with defending player.\nWhenever you win a clash, draw a card. Then you may cast a spell from your hand with mana value 8 or less without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，与防御牌手比点。 每当你赢得比点时，抓一张牌。然后你可以从你手上施放一个法术力值等于或小于8的咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: MKC·316 | Mirko, Obsessive Theorist | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mirko, Obsessive Theorist
trans-unit.target: 偏执理论家米尔柯

trans-unit.resname: MKC·316 | Mirko, Obsessive Theorist | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying, vigilance\nWhenever you surveil, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.\nAt the beginning of your end step, you may return target creature card with power less than Mirko's from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it.
trans-unit.target: 飞行，警戒 每当你刺探时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 在你的结束步骤开始时，你可以将目标力量小于米尔柯的生物牌从你坟墓场移回战场，且上面有一个终命指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MKC·317 | Morska, Undersea Sleuth | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 海底侦员莫思卡

trans-unit.source: You have no maximum hand size.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, investigate.\nWhenever you draw your second card each turn, put two +1/+1 counters on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 你的手牌数量没有上限。 在你的维持开始时，探查。 每当你抓每回合中你的第二张牌时，在CARDNAME上放置两个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MKC·318 | Nelly Borca, Impulsive Accuser | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, suspect target creature. Then goad all suspected creatures.\nWhenever one or more creatures an opponent controls deal combat damage to one or more of your opponents, you and the controller of those creatures each draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 警戒 每当CARDNAME攻击时，怀疑目标生物。然后煽惑所有已遭疑的生物。 每当由对手操控的一个或数个生物向你的一位或多位对手造成战斗伤害时，你和这些生物的操控者各抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create Tiny, a legendary 2/2 green Dog Detective creature token with trample.\n{1}, Sacrifice an artifact token: Put a +1/+1 counter on each Dog you control.\nWhenever a Dog you control deals combat damage to a player, create a Food token, then investigate.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出传奇衍生生物小小，其为2/2绿色，具践踏异能的狗／侦探。 {1}，牺牲一个衍生神器：在每个由你操控的狗上各放置一个+1/+1指示物。 每当一个由你操控的狗对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，派出一个食品衍生物，然后探查。

trans-unit.target: 不朽职责

trans-unit.source: Return target creature card from an opponent's graveyard to the battlefield under their control with a duty counter on it. For as long as that creature has a duty counter on it, it is goaded, can't attack you or a permanent you control, and can't block creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物牌在任一对手的操控下从其坟墓场放进战场，且上面有一个职责指示物。于该生物上有职责指示物的时段内，它为已煽惑，不能攻击你或由你操控的永久物，且不能阻挡由你操控的生物。

trans-unit.source: Havoc Eater

trans-unit.resname: MKC·341 | Havoc Eater | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, for each opponent, goad up to one target creature that opponent controls. Put X +1/+1 counters on CARDNAME, where X is the total power of creatures goaded this way.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，为每位对手各进行以下流程～煽惑至多一个目标由其操控的生物。在CARDNAME上放置X个+1/+1指示物，X为以此法煽惑之生物的力量总和。

trans-unit.resname: MKC·342 | Hot Pursuit | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hot Pursuit
trans-unit.target: 穷追不舍

trans-unit.resname: MKC·342 | Hot Pursuit | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, suspect target creature an opponent controls. As long as CARDNAME remains on the battlefield, that creature is also goaded.\nAt the beginning of combat on your turn, if two or more players have lost the game, gain control of all goaded and/or suspected creatures until end of turn. Untap them. They gain haste until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，怀疑目标由对手操控的生物。只要CARDNAME仍在战场上，该生物也为已煽惑。 在你回合的战斗开始时，若已有两位或更多牌手输掉这盘游戏，则获得所有已煽惑和／或遭疑生物的操控权直到回合结束。将它们重置。它们获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MKC·343 | Mob Verdict | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mob Verdict
trans-unit.target: 暴民裁定

trans-unit.resname: MKC·343 | Mob Verdict | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Secret council — Each player secretly votes for another player, then those votes are revealed. For each vote an opponent received, CARDNAME deals 2 damage to that player and each creature that player controls. For each vote you received, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 密议～每位牌手各私下投票选择另一位牌手，然后展示投票结果。对每位对手而言，其每得一票，CARDNAME便对该牌手和由该牌手操控的每个生物各造成2点伤害。你每得一票，便抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MKC·343 | Mob Verdict | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The court of public opinion doesn't hear appeals.
trans-unit.target: 舆论法庭不接受上诉。

trans-unit.resname: MKC·344 | Prisoner's Dilemma | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Prisoner's Dilemma
trans-unit.target: 囚徒困境

trans-unit.resname: MKC·344 | Prisoner's Dilemma | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Each opponent secretly chooses silence or snitch, then the choices are revealed. If each opponent chose silence, CARDNAME deals 4 damage to each of them. If each opponent chose snitch, CARDNAME deals 8 damage to each of them. Otherwise, CARDNAME deals 12 damage to each opponent who chose silence.\nFlashback {5}{R}{R}
trans-unit.target: 每位对手各私下选择「缄默」或「告发」，然后展示选择结果。如果所有对手均选择「缄默」，则CARDNAME对其各造成4点伤害。如果所有对手均选择「告发」，则CARDNAME对其各造成8点伤害。若以上皆非，则CARDNAME向每位选择「缄默」的对手各造成12点伤害。 返照{5}{R}{R}

trans-unit.resname: MKC·345 | Showstopping Surprise | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Showstopping Surprise
trans-unit.target: 镇场惊喜

trans-unit.resname: MKC·345 | Showstopping Surprise | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose target creature you control. Turn it face up if it's face down. Then it deals damage equal to its power to each other creature.
trans-unit.target: 选择目标由你操控的生物。如果它牌面朝下，则将它翻回正面。然后它对每个其他生物各造成伤害，其数量等同于前者的力量。

trans-unit.resname: MKC·345 | Showstopping Surprise | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I prefer gasps and screams to polite applause."\n—Judith
trans-unit.target: 「相比礼貌的掌声，我更喜欢惊呼与尖叫。」 ～裘蒂丝

trans-unit.target: 裘蒂丝的地狱犬特煞

trans-unit.resname: MKC·346 | Tesak, Judith's Hellhound | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Unleash
Other Dogs you control have unleash.
Creatures you control with counters on them have haste.
Whenever CARDNAME attacks, add {R} for each attacking creature.
trans-unit.target: 脱缰 由你操控的其他狗具有脱缰异能。 由你操控且其上有指示物的生物具有敏捷异能。 每当CARDNAME攻击时，每有一个进行攻击的生物，便加{R}。

trans-unit.resname: MKC·347 | Experiment Twelve | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Experiment Twelve
trans-unit.target: 十二号实验体

trans-unit.resname: MKC·347 | Experiment Twelve | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nWhenever CARDNAME or another creature you control is turned face up, put +1/+1 counters on that creature equal to its power.\nDisguise {4}{G}

trans-unit.resname: MKC·348 | Innocuous Researcher | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Innocuous Researcher
trans-unit.target: 无害研究员

trans-unit.resname: MKC·348 | Innocuous Researcher | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Parley — Whenever CARDNAME attacks, each player reveals the top card of their library. For each nonland card revealed this way, you investigate. Then each player draws a card.\nAt the beginning of your end step, you may untap all lands you control. If you do, you can't cast spells until your next turn.
trans-unit.target: 论争～每当CARDNAME攻击时，每位牌手各展示其牌库顶牌。每以此法展示出一张非地牌，你便探查一次。然后每位牌手各抓一张牌。 在你的结束步骤开始时，你可以重置所有由你操控的地。若你如此作，则直到你的下一个回合，你不能施放咒语。

trans-unit.resname: MKC·349 | On the Trail | Card Name
trans-unit.source: On the Trail
trans-unit.target: 追寻痕迹

trans-unit.resname: MKC·349 | On the Trail | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 每当你抓每回合中你的第二张牌时，你可以将一张地牌从你手上横置放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: MKC·349 | On the Trail | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Where the victim's journey ends, the investigator's begins.
trans-unit.target: 被害人的旅途终点，便是探员的事务起点。

trans-unit.target: 模印泥浆

trans-unit.source: Deathtouch\nWhenever CARDNAME or another creature you control is turned face up, create a 0/0 green Ooze creature token with trample. The token enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of other creatures you control.\nDisguise {3}{G}

trans-unit.source: Counterpoint
trans-unit.target: 对点反论

trans-unit.resname: MKC·351 | Counterpoint | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell. You may cast a creature, instant, sorcery, or planeswalker spell from your graveyard with mana value less than or equal to that spell's mana value without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。你可以从你的坟墓场中施放一个法术力值等于或小于该咒语的生物，瞬间，法术或鹏洛客咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: MKC·351 | Counterpoint | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Nice theory, but I'm going to have to poke some holes in it."
trans-unit.target: 「想法不错，但我得在上面戳几个洞。」

trans-unit.target: 积识储力

trans-unit.source: Creatures you control get +X/+X, where X is the number of cards you've drawn this turn.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物得+X/+X，X为你本回合已抓的牌数量。

trans-unit.resname: MKC·352 | Knowledge Is Power | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Tremble, criminal, before the overwhelming might of meticulously organized evidence!"
trans-unit.target: 「在事无巨细认真整理之充分证据带来的巨量震撼面前颤抖吧，罪犯！」

trans-unit.target: 吞饵上钩

trans-unit.resname: MKC·353 | Take the Bait | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Cast this spell only during an opponent's turn and only during combat.\nPrevent all combat damage that would be dealt to you and planeswalkers you control this turn. Untap all attacking creatures and goad them. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.
trans-unit.target: 只能于对手的回合中施放此咒语，且仅限战斗中。 于本回合中，防止将对你和由你操控之鹏洛客造成的所有战斗伤害。重置所有进行攻击的生物并煽惑它们。在此阶段后，额外多出一个战斗阶段。

trans-unit.target: {T}：你本回合中施放之下一个牌面朝下的生物咒语减少{3}来施放。 如果由你操控之永久物具有的触发式异能因牌面朝下的永久物翻回正面而触发，则该异能额外触发一次。

trans-unit.target: 魔调局负责的每桩案子里的每处实情、每名嫌犯和每条证据都显现其上。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·1 | Case of the Shattered Pact | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When this Case enters the battlefield, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.\nTo solve — There are five colors among permanents you control. (If unsolved, solve at the beginning of your end step.)\nSolved — At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gains flying, double strike, and vigilance until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 当此案件进战场时，从你牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。 侦办～由你操控之永久物中包括的颜色有五种。（若本案未侦结，则在你的结束步骤开始时侦办。） 侦结～在你回合的战斗开始时，目标由你操控的生物获得飞行、连击与警戒异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.target: 赦罪拉玛苏

trans-unit.resname: MKM·2 | Absolving Lammasu | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, all suspected creatures are no longer suspected.\nWhen CARDNAME dies, you gain 3 life and suspect up to one target creature an opponent controls. (A suspected creature has menace and can't block.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，所有已遭疑的生物不再遭疑。 当CARDNAME死去时，你获得3点生命且怀疑至多一个目标由对手操控的生物。（已遭疑的生物具有威慑异能且不能进行阻挡。）

trans-unit.target: 你可以随时检视你的牌库顶牌。 限每回合一次，你可以从你牌库顶施放力量等于或小于2的生物咒语。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·3 | Assemble the Players | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "All will soon be made clear, but I can give you this: our killer is here with us, in this very room."\n—Alquist Proft

trans-unit.target: 将目标法术力值等于或小于3的生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。在其上放置一个飞行指示物。它额外具有精怪此类别。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·6 | Call a Surprise Witness | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Why would a little thing like death stop me from running the Syndicate? I'm going to be here for a long, long time."
trans-unit.target: 「死亡这种小事，又怎能阻止我继续统领欧佐夫集团？我会在这个位置待上很久、很久。」

You may reveal an enchantment card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.\nYou may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast Case spells.

(It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

(If unsolved, solve at the beginning of your end step.)\nSolved — Sacrifice this Case: Creature cards in your graveyard gain "You may cast this card from your graveyard" until end of turn.

trans-unit.resname: MKM·11 | Defenestrated Phantom | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Never parley near high windows."\n—Teysa
trans-unit.target: 「不要在高窗边上争论不休。」 ～泰莎

trans-unit.resname: MKM·12 | Delney, Streetwise Lookout | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Delney, Streetwise Lookout
trans-unit.target: 街头监哨德雷尼

trans-unit.resname: MKM·12 | Delney, Streetwise Lookout | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control with power 2 or less can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater.\nIf an ability of a creature you control with power 2 or less triggers, that ability triggers an additional time.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控且力量等于或小于2的生物不能被力量等于或大于3的生物阻挡。 如果由你操控且力量等于或小于2之生物的异能触发，则该异能额外触发一次。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·12 | Delney, Streetwise Lookout | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It's not a matter of what I know. It's a matter of making it worth my while to tell you."
trans-unit.target: 「我知道什么不重要。是不是值得花时间跟你说才重要。」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·13 | Doorkeeper Thrull | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Doorkeeper Thrull
trans-unit.target: 索尔兽门卫

trans-unit.resname: MKM·13 | Doorkeeper Thrull | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nFlying\nArtifacts and creatures entering the battlefield don't cause abilities to trigger.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 飞行 进战场的神器和生物不会触发异能。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·13 | Doorkeeper Thrull | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Parties at Karlov Manor are strictly invitation only.
trans-unit.target: 卡洛夫庄园的宴会都是非请勿进，且严格执行。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·14 | Due Diligence | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Due Diligence
trans-unit.target: 尽心尽责

trans-unit.resname: MKM·14 | Due Diligence | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target creature you control other than enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and gains vigilance until end of turn.\nEnchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 当CARDNAME进战场时，直到回合结束，目标所结附生物以外由你操控的生物得+2/+2且获得警戒异能。 所结附的生物得+2/+2且具有警戒异能。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·15 | Essence of Antiquity | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Essence of Antiquity
trans-unit.target: 古迹菁华

trans-unit.resname: MKM·15 | Essence of Antiquity | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Disguise {2}{W} (You may cast this card face down for {3} as a 2/2 creature with ward {2}. Turn it face up any time for its disguise cost.)\nWhen CARDNAME is turned face up, creatures you control gain hexproof until end of turn. Untap them.
trans-unit.target: 伪装{2}{W}（你可以牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2、具守护{2}的生物。可随时支付其伪装费用使其翻回正面。） 当CARDNAME翻回正面时，由你操控的生物获得辟邪异能直到回合结束。将它们重置。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·15 | Essence of Antiquity | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In a city as old as Ravnica, history takes on a life of its own—even when you least expect it.
trans-unit.target: 像拉尼卡这样年头悠久的城市，历史都能活出真我～甚至是在你最不希望看到的时候。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·16 | Forum Familiar | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Forum Familiar
trans-unit.target: 法院佣兽

trans-unit.resname: MKM·16 | Forum Familiar | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Disguise {1}{W} (You may cast this card face down for {3} as a 2/2 creature with ward {2}. Turn it face up any time for its disguise cost.)\nWhen CARDNAME is turned face up, return another target permanent you control to its owner's hand and put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 伪装{1}{W}（你可以牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2、具守护{2}的生物。可随时支付其伪装费用使其翻回正面。） 当CARDNAME翻回正面时，将另一个目标由你操控的永久物移回其拥有者手上，并在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Griffnaut Tracker
trans-unit.target: 驭鹫追迹人

trans-unit.resname: MKM·17 | Griffnaut Tracker | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile up to two target cards from a single graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，将至多两张目标在同一坟墓场中的牌从该处放逐。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·17 | Griffnaut Tracker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The desperate will tread unexpected paths. Be prepared to follow."\n—Tam Sennic, Ezrim's second-in-command
trans-unit.target: 「亡命之徒逃跑时会慌不择路。时刻做好准备追上去。」 ～伊泽霖副手坦姆森尼克

trans-unit.target: 哈兹达警卫

trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control with power 2 or less.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME进战场或攻击时，在目标由你操控且力量等于或小于2的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·18 | Haazda Vigilante | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Call the Boros if you want. While they figure out if they have enough people to send a patrol, I'll be out clobbering the lowlifes who robbed you."
trans-unit.target: 「你要报官找波洛斯就去报。等他们还在研究是否有人手出队巡逻时，我早就已经把那些抢劫你的混蛋打得满地找牙了。」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·19 | Inside Source | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Inside Source
trans-unit.target: 内部线民

trans-unit.resname: MKM·19 | Inside Source | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 white and blue Detective creature token.\n{3}, {T}: Target Detective you control gets +2/+0 and gains vigilance until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个2/2，白蓝双色的侦探衍生生物。 {3}，{T}：直到回合结束，目标由你操控的侦探得+2/+0且获得警戒异能。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·19 | Inside Source | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I was never here."
trans-unit.target: 「我没来过。」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·20 | Karlov Watchdog | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 卡洛夫看守犬

trans-unit.resname: MKM·20 | Karlov Watchdog | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance\nPermanents your opponents control can't be turned face up during your turn.\nWhenever you attack with three or more creatures, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 警戒 由对手操控之永久物于你的回合中不能翻回正面。 每当你以三个或更多生物攻击时，由你操控的生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·20 | Karlov Watchdog | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Teysa trusts only those for whom money has no meaning.
trans-unit.target: 泰莎只信任钱财对其了无意义者。

trans-unit.source:
Equipped creature gets +2/+0.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: You gain 3 life.
When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}{W}. If you do, create two 1/1 white Dog creature tokens.

trans-unit.source: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with power 4 or greater.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标神器，结界或力量等于或大于4的生物。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·22 | Make Your Move | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "If you're thinking only one step ahead, you're already falling behind."\n—Teysa
trans-unit.target: 「如果你只想到一步之外，那就已经落后了。」 ～泰莎

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，放逐目标由对手操控的生物，直到CARDNAME离开战场为止。你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·23 | Makeshift Binding | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Kaya clung to the cords of the barrier ward with all her might, trapping the thrashing dryad like a fly in a spider's web.
trans-unit.target: 卡娅牢牢牵紧魔法绳索，将愤怒出击的树灵困在屏障结界之中，令其犹如落入蛛网的飞蝇一般动弹不得。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·24 | Marketwatch Phantom | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 巡市幽魅

trans-unit.target: 每当另一个力量等于或小于2的生物在你操控下进战场时，CARDNAME获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·24 | Marketwatch Phantom | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It's amazing how efficient a detective you can be when you're not slowed down by things like self-preservation or walls."
trans-unit.target: 「在不用考虑自身安危，免受墙壁阻挡之后，瞧瞧你这个侦探多能干。」

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, create a 2/2 white and blue Detective creature token.\nDisguise {1}{W} (You may cast this card face down for {3} as a 2/2 creature with ward {2}. Turn it face up any time for its disguise cost.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，派出一个2/2，白蓝双色的侦探衍生生物。 伪装{1}{W}（你可以牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2、具守护{2}的生物。可随时支付其伪装费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·25 | Museum Nightwatch | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "You there, halt! The gallery is closed. Wait—what are you doing?"
trans-unit.target: 「那边的，站住！展馆已经打烊了。等等～你要干什么？」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·26 | Neighborhood Guardian | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A rare and beloved exception to the Agency's "no one is above suspicion" rule.
trans-unit.target: 魔调局奉「无人不疑」为圭臬，但它是个稀有的可爱例外。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·27 | No Witnesses | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 不留人证

trans-unit.source: Each player who controls the most creatures investigates. Then destroy all creatures. (To investigate, create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 令每位操控生物最多的牌手探查。然后消灭所有生物。（探查的流程，是派出一个线索衍生物。它是具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·27 | No Witnesses | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When cunning fails, there's always violence.
trans-unit.target: 动口不成的时候，总还是能动手。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·28 | Not on My Watch | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Not on My Watch
trans-unit.target: 所视必管

trans-unit.resname: MKM·28 | Not on My Watch | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile target attacking creature.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标进行攻击的生物。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·28 | Not on My Watch | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "You know, Proft, I've done a lot of questionable things in my life, but helping a pompous detective save lives is a new low, even for me."
trans-unit.target: 「波费，你知道吗，虽然我这辈子已经干过许多亏心事，但帮一位自大侦探救人性命，就连我都觉得很没面子。」

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，探查。（派出一个线索衍生物。它是具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·29 | Novice Inspector | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "If the perfect evidence appears at your feet, your first task is to rule out misdirection."\n—The Ravnican Agency of Magicological Investigations handbook
trans-unit.target: 「如果脚边出现完美证据，首要之务便是排除误导。」 ～拉尼卡循魔调查局手册

trans-unit.resname: MKM·30 | On the Job | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn. Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物得+2/+1直到回合结束。探查。（派出一个线索衍生物。它是具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·30 | On the Job | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: For all their differences, Kaya, Kellan, and Agrus Kos agreed on one thing: none of them would rest until Teysa's murderer was brought to justice.
trans-unit.target: 尽管分歧众多，但卡娅、凯澜和阿固寇斯在一件事上达成了共识：不将谋杀泰莎的凶手绳之于法，他们绝不停歇。

trans-unit.source: He makes sure no one sets foot in a fresh crime scene—not even himself.
trans-unit.target: 他确保无人踏足新犯案现场～包括他自己。

trans-unit.target: 守军 {2}{W}，{T}：横置目标生物。你可以在其上放置一个晕眩指示物。若你如此作，则在CARDNAME上放置一个晕眩指示物。（如果其上有晕眩指示物的永久物将成为未横置，则改为从其上移去一个晕眩指示物。）

trans-unit.source: {1}{W}, Collect evidence 2: CARDNAME becomes a Human Detective with base power and toughness 4/4 and gains vigilance.\n{2}{W}, Collect evidence 4: If CARDNAME is a Detective, it becomes a legendary creature named Mileva, the Stalwart, it has base power and toughness 5/5, and it gains "Other creatures you control have indestructible."

trans-unit.target: 飞行 伪装{1}{U}（你可以牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2、具守护{2}的生物。可随时支付其伪装费用使其翻回正面。） 当CARDNAME翻回正面时，直到回合结束，每当一个由你操控的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，探查。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·66 | Out Cold | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Out Cold
trans-unit.target: 一冻不醒

trans-unit.resname: MKM·66 | Out Cold | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: This spell can't be countered. (This includes by the ward ability.)\nTap up to two target creatures and put a stun counter on each of them. Investigate. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)
trans-unit.target: 此咒语不能被反击。（包括不能被守护异能反击。） 横置至多两个目标生物并在这些生物上各放置一个晕眩指示物。探查。（如果其上有晕眩指示物的永久物将成为未横置，则改为从其上移去一个晕眩指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·66 | Out Cold | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We'll get their statements after they defrost."\n—Dvika of the Foundway Associates
trans-unit.target: 「等解冻之后再来录他们的口供。」 ～寻路侦探社的妮湖格卡德

trans-unit.resname: MKM·67 | Proft's Eidetic Memory | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Proft's Eidetic Memory
trans-unit.target: 波费的清晰记忆

trans-unit.resname: MKM·67 | Proft's Eidetic Memory | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw a card.\nYou have no maximum hand size.\nAt the beginning of combat on your turn, if you've drawn more than one card this turn, put X +1/+1 counters on target creature you control, where X is the number of cards you've drawn this turn minus one.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，抓一张牌。 你的手牌数量没有上限。 在你回合的战斗开始时，若你本回合中抓过的牌多于一张，则在目标由你操控的生物上放置X个+1/+1指示物，X为你本回合已抓的牌数量减一。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·68 | Projektor Inspector | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Projektor Inspector
trans-unit.target: 映射镜巡检员

trans-unit.resname: MKM·68 | Projektor Inspector | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another Detective enters the battlefield under your control and whenever a Detective you control is turned face up, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或另一个侦探在你操控下进战场和每当一个由你操控的侦探翻回正面时，你可以抓一张牌。若你如此作，则弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·68 | Projektor Inspector | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Bring up the particulars from yesterday's altercation, and enhance."
trans-unit.target: 「调出昨日争执的细节，并放清楚些。」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·69 | Reasonable Doubt | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Reasonable Doubt
trans-unit.target: 合理疑团

trans-unit.resname: MKM·69 | Reasonable Doubt | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.\nSuspect up to one target creature. (A suspected creature has menace and can't block.)
trans-unit.target: 除非目标咒语的操控者支付{2}，否则反击之。 怀疑至多一个目标生物。（已遭疑的生物具有威慑异能且不能进行阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·69 | Reasonable Doubt | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Merle had the motive, but Blovinac was the one caught with the murder weapon. And who was the seven-foot-tall hooded figure? This case is a mess!"
trans-unit.target: 「虽然默雷有动机，但被逮时手握凶器的是牛维亚。那个身高七尺戴着兜帽的人影又是谁？这案子一整个就是团乱麻！」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·70 | Reenact the Crime | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Reenact the Crime
trans-unit.target: 重现罪行

trans-unit.resname: MKM·70 | Reenact the Crime | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile target nonland card in a graveyard that was put there from anywhere this turn. Copy it. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标在坟墓场中的非地牌，且须为本回合中从任何区域置入该处者。将它复制。你可以施放该复制品，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·70 | Reenact the Crime | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: At Proft's command, an ethereal model of the ransacked workshop sprang into being, every detail perfectly recreated. He'd missed something—he knew it—but what?
trans-unit.target: 波费大手一挥，遭劫工作室的虚像模型便跃然眼前，每处细节都已完美还原。但他还是漏了点东西～他自己也知道这一点～但漏了什么呢？

trans-unit.resname: MKM·71 | Steamcore Scholar | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Steamcore Scholar
trans-unit.target: 蒸气核学者

trans-unit.resname: MKM·71 | Steamcore Scholar | Card Text | Paragraphs

trans-unit.target: 飞行，警戒 当CARDNAME进战场时，抓两张牌。然后除非你弃一张瞬间或法术牌或一张具飞行异能的生物牌，否则弃两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·71 | Steamcore Scholar | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Hm. That's weird."
trans-unit.target: 「嗯。真奇怪啊。」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·74 | Unauthorized Exit | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Proft had never been a by-the-book investigator, but even he never expected to find himself breaking a notorious assassin out of a maximum-security Azorius holding cell.
trans-unit.target: 波费从来就不是个照着常理出牌的探员，不过他也从未想过自己有一天会深入戒备森严的俄佐立拘留室，帮助恶名杀手逃出生天。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·89 | It Doesn't Add Up | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Etrata had committed dozens of murders, all of which she recalled in perfect, loving detail. But no matter how hard she tried, she couldn't remember killing Zegana.

trans-unit.resname: MKM·95 | Murder | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Laughter and conversation trailed off as the revelers gathered around Zegana's body. Three things quickly became clear: it was a murder, the killer was likely among them, and Teysa's party was definitely over.
trans-unit.target: 随着狂欢人群聚拢在洁加娜遗体周围，欢声笑语逐渐止歇。大家很快就弄清楚了三件事：这是桩谋杀案；凶手就在众人之间；泰莎的派对当真结束了。

You lose 2 life.\n{2}, {T}, Collect evidence 3: Each opponent loses 3 life unless they discard a card or sacrifice a creature. (To collect evidence 3, exile cards with total mana value 3 or greater from your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，检视你牌库顶的四张牌。将其中两张置于你手上，其余则置入你的坟墓场。你失去2点生命。 {2}，{T}，搜证3：对每位对手而言，除非其弃一张牌或牺牲一个生物，否则失去3点生命。（搜证3的流程，是从你坟墓场中放逐法术力值加总达到3或更多的牌。）

trans-unit.source: "Blasted sketch artist did too good a job. Looks like it's time for me to lie low for a little while."
trans-unit.target: 「这该死的素描画师画得也太像。我得低调一小段时间了。」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·104 | Slimy Dualleech | Flavor Text

trans-unit.resname: MKM·105 | Snarling Gorehound | Flavor Text

trans-unit.resname: MKM·106 | Soul Enervation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Judith's plan was close to fruition. She couldn't have Agrus get in the way.
trans-unit.target: 裘蒂丝的计划就快大功告成。这时可不能让阿固寇斯坏了好事。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·107 | Toxin Analysis | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 毒理分析

trans-unit.resname: MKM·107 | Toxin Analysis | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 目标生物获得死触与系命异能直到回合结束。探查。（派出一个线索衍生物。它是具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·107 | Toxin Analysis | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Poison this deadly is only used by the Ochran. Either the Golgari are behind this, or someone wants us to think they are."
trans-unit.target: 「只有瓯坎的人才会用上这般猛烈的毒药。要么这就是葛加理干的，要么是有人想让我们以为是他们干的。」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·108 | Undercity Eliminator | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 地底城索命客

trans-unit.resname: MKM·108 | Undercity Eliminator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice an artifact or creature. When you do, exile target creature an opponent controls.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以牺牲一个神器或生物。当你如此作时，放逐目标由对手操控的生物。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·108 | Undercity Eliminator | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: With their guild shunned for opening the doors to Phyrexia, some among the Golgari embraced their status as pariahs and took out their bitterness on all who crossed their paths.
trans-unit.target: 葛加理由于当初向非瑞克西亚打开门户，现在公会声望每况日下；其间部分成员也接受了最底层的身份，将一切苦楚都宣泄在不小心碰到的路人身上。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·109 | Unscrupulous Agent | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Obtaining evidence through the "proper" channels can take weeks of paperwork. Sometimes justice just can't wait.
trans-unit.target: 透过「正规」渠道取得证据得花上数周时间来走书面流程。有时正义等不了这么久。

Flying

You may put a creature card exiled this way onto the battlefield. It gains haste. Return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.

trans-unit.resname: MKM·112 | Bolrac-Clan Basher | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Determining the culprit was not difficult. Getting him to stop committing the crime long enough to be arrested, however, was a massive challenge.

trans-unit.source: When this Case enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target creature an opponent controls.\nTo solve — Three or more sources you controlled dealt damage this turn. (If unsolved, solve at the beginning of your end step.)\nSolved — Sacrifice this Case: Exile the top three cards of your library. Choose one of them. You may play that card this turn.

trans-unit.resname: MKM·141 | Reckless Detective | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Reckless Detective
trans-unit.target: 无忌侦探

trans-unit.resname: MKM·141 | Reckless Detective | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, you may sacrifice an artifact or discard a card. If you do, draw a card and CARDNAME gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以牺牲一个神器或弃一张牌。若你如此作，则抓一张牌且CARDNAME得+2/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·141 | Reckless Detective | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: He's gonna crack this thing wide open.
trans-unit.target: 他大动干戈想要砸破一切。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·142 | Red Herring | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Haste\nCARDNAME attacks each combat if able.\n{2}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 敏捷 CARDNAME每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击。 {2}，牺牲CARDNAME：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·142 | Red Herring | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Thopters are but one option in our suite of autonomous surveillance solutions."\n—Kylox
trans-unit.target: 「我们有许多自动化布控方案，扑翼机不过是其中一种。」 ～奇洛兹

trans-unit.resname: MKM·143 | Rubblebelt Braggart | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, if it's not suspected, you may suspect it. (A suspected creature has menace and can't block.)
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，若它未遭疑，则你可以怀疑它。（已遭疑的生物具有威慑异能且不能进行阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·143 | Rubblebelt Braggart | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I did it! Double—no, triple homicide! In a building I set on fire. Yep, all me."
trans-unit.target: 「我干的！两条～不，三条人命！就在我点着的那栋楼里。全是我干的。」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·144 | Shock | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: She realized that she could not, in fact, handle the truth.

trans-unit.source:
Choose one —
• Search your library for a creature or land card and reveal it. Put it onto the battlefield tapped if it's a land card. Otherwise, put it into your hand. Then shuffle.
• Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
• Exile target artifact or enchantment.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～ •从你牌库中搜寻一张生物或地牌并展示之。如果它是地牌，则将它横置放进战场。若否，则将它置于你手上。然后洗牌。 •在目标由你操控的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。它对目标不由你操控的生物造成伤害，其数量等同于前者的力量。 •放逐目标神器或结界。

It's still a land. Activate only as a sorcery. (To collect evidence 4, exile cards with total mana value 4 or greater from your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 你可以选择于你的重置步骤中不重置CARDNAME。 {3}{G}，{T}，搜证4：于CARDNAME持续横置的时段内，目标由你操控的地成为5/5绿色，具敏捷异能的植物／野猪生物。它仍然是地。只能于法术时机起动。（搜证4的流程，是从你坟墓场中放逐法术力值加总达到4或更多的牌。）

trans-unit.source: Look at the top five cards of your library, cloak two of them, and put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. (To cloak a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature with ward {2}. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的五张牌，匿伏其中两张，并将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。（匿伏某牌的流程，是将该牌牌面朝下地放进战场，当成2/2、具守护{2}的生物。如果该牌是生物牌，则可随时支付其法术力费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·166 | Hide in Plain Sight | Flavor Text

Then secretly choose Human, Merfolk, or Goblin.\nSacrifice CARDNAME, Reveal the chosen creature type: If target attacking creature token is the chosen type, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it gains deathtouch until end of turn.

trans-unit.target: 威慑，守护{2}，敏捷 每当CARDNAME攻击时，牺牲任意数量的其他生物，然后放逐你牌库顶的X张牌，X为这些生物的力量总和。你可以从所放逐的牌之中施放任意数量的瞬间和／或法术咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·215 | Kylox's Voltstrider | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kylox's Voltstrider
trans-unit.target: 奇洛兹的电行械

trans-unit.resname: MKM·215 | Kylox's Voltstrider | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Collect evidence 6: CARDNAME becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell from among cards exiled with it. If that spell would be put into a graveyard, put it on the bottom of its owner's library instead.\nCrew 2
trans-unit.target: 搜证6：CARDNAME成为神器生物直到回合结束。 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以从以其放逐的牌之中施放一个瞬间或法术咒语。如果该咒语将进入坟墓场，则改为将它置于其拥有者的牌库底。 搭载2

trans-unit.resname: MKM·216 | Lazav, Wearer of Faces | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: MKM·216 | Lazav, Wearer of Faces | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, exile target card from a graveyard, then investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")\nWhenever you sacrifice a Clue, you may have Lazav become a copy of a creature card exiled with it until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，将目标牌从坟墓场放逐，然后探查。（派出一个线索衍生物。它是具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。） 每当你牺牲一个线索时，你可以使拉札夫成为一张以其放逐之生物牌的复制品直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·217 | Leyline of the Guildpact | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Leyline of the Guildpact
trans-unit.target: 十会盟地脉

trans-unit.resname: MKM·217 | Leyline of the Guildpact | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.\nEach nonland permanent you control is all colors.\nLands you control are every basic land type in addition to their other types.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的起手牌中包含了CARDNAME，则你可以让它在战场上来开始游戏。 每个由你操控的非地永久物均是五色。 由你操控的地均额外具有所有基本地类别。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·218 | Lightning Helix | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 闪电螺旋

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成3点伤害且你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·218 | Lightning Helix | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: After heavy casualties in the Phyrexian invasion, the Boros mage-priests trained as many rank-and-file soldiers as possible to wield the Legion's legendary battle magic.
trans-unit.target: 经历非瑞克西亚大侵攻的惨痛伤亡后，波洛斯的法师僧侣开始向普通士兵传授知识，希望有尽可能多的人能够自如运用教团的传奇战斗魔法。

trans-unit.target: 误时青年

trans-unit.source: Haste\nWhenever you attack with three or more creatures, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 敏捷 每当你以三个或更多生物攻击时，探查。（派出一个线索衍生物。它是具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: MKM·219 | Meddling Youths | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Well, if it isn't mean old Mr. Larchbottom, who's always been so eager to have the only dumpling stall in Oxblood Alley."
trans-unit.target: 「哎呀，这不是臭脾气的老松底先生嘛。你是不是还急着在牛血巷开出一家面点铺？」

trans-unit.source: Flying, hexproof from multicolored\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, it deals X damage to any target, target player draws X cards, and you gain X life, where X is the number of different color pairs among permanents you control that are exactly two colors.
trans-unit.target: 飞行，反多色辟邪 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，它对任意一个目标造成X点伤害，目标牌手抓X张牌，且你获得X点生命，X为由你操控且为正好两色的永久物中不同双色色组的种数。

trans-unit.target: 除非目标咒语的操控者支付{3}，否则反击之。如果以此法反击该咒语，则改为将它放逐，而非置入其拥有者的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·221 | No More Lies | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Lies fester and flourish in shadow. Our job is to bathe them in light."\n—Ezrim, Agency chief
trans-unit.target: 「黯影之中，谎言会不断腐生滋长。我们的任务便是将其曝露在明光之下。」 ～魔调局局长伊泽霖

trans-unit.source: This spell costs {W}{U} more to cast for each target beyond the first.\nChoose any number of target players. Investigate X times, where X is the total number of creatures those players control.
trans-unit.target: 此咒语在第一个目标之外每有一个目标，便增加{W}{U}来施放。 选择任意数量的目标牌手。探查X次，X为由这些牌手操控之生物的总数量。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·222 | Officious Interrogation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: No guest was permitted to leave before being questioned in an Azorius verity circle.
trans-unit.target: 每位宾客都要进入俄佐立真相环之中接受讯问，没完成之前不准离开。

trans-unit.target: 由你操控的其他侦探得+1/+1。 每当你抓每回合中你的第二张牌时，目标侦探本回合不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·223 | Private Eye | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Yep. It's a vase, all right."
trans-unit.target: 「是的。这是花瓶，没问题。」

trans-unit.resname: MKM·224 | Rakdos, Patron of Chaos | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Finally, a performance worthy of my applause!"

trans-unit.source: The great meditation garden of Sumala was no place for Ravnica's rising crime wave, and he would keep it that way.

trans-unit.resname: MKM·287 | Assemble the Players | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Assemble the Players
trans-unit.target: 召集选手

trans-unit.resname: MKM·287 | Assemble the Players | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You may look at the top card of your library any time.\nOnce each turn, you may cast a creature spell with power 2 or less from the top of your library.
trans-unit.target: 你可以随时检视你的牌库顶牌。 限每回合一次，你可以从你牌库顶施放力量等于或小于2的生物咒语。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·287 | Assemble the Players | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "One of these people is the mastermind. I wonder, do they still believe they won't be caught?"\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target: 「案件主谋就藏在这些人当中。我在想，他们是否依然觉得自己能够逍遥法外？」 ～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.resname: MKM·288 | Auspicious Arrival | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Auspicious Arrival
trans-unit.target: 朗报到来

trans-unit.resname: MKM·288 | Auspicious Arrival | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Investigate.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+2/+2直到回合结束。探查。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·288 | Auspicious Arrival | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Azorius are too obsessed with facts to see the truth that knits them together. They'll never solve this case unless I step in."\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target: 「俄佐立过于注重个别事证，却看不清将它们串成一体的真相。我要是不出手，他们永远破不了案。」 ～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.resname: MKM·289 | Call a Surprise Witness | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Call a Surprise Witness
trans-unit.target: 突召人证

trans-unit.resname: MKM·289 | Call a Surprise Witness | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Put a flying counter on it. It's a Spirit in addition to its other types.
trans-unit.target: 将目标法术力值等于或小于3的生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。在其上放置一个飞行指示物。它额外具有精怪此类别。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·289 | Call a Surprise Witness | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Honestly, the real surprise would be if a powerful member of the Orzhov *didn't* hang around after their demise."\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target:
「说实话，如果哪个欧佐夫权贵死掉之后没有在现场露脸，那才是意料之外。」
～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.resname: MKM·290 | Makeshift Binding | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Makeshift Binding
trans-unit.target: 临时束缚

trans-unit.resname: MKM·290 | Makeshift Binding | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until CARDNAME leaves the battlefield. You gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，放逐目标由对手操控的生物，直到CARDNAME离开战场为止。你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·290 | Makeshift Binding | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "With the treacherous Oba separated from her sisters, I'm hopeful that Trostani will, in some form, eventually recover."\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target: 「性情大变的欧芭已脱离姐妹身躯，但我相信卓塔妮最终一定会如常恢复均衡。」 ～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.resname: MKM·291 | Not on My Watch | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Not on My Watch
trans-unit.target: 所视必管

trans-unit.resname: MKM·291 | Not on My Watch | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile target attacking creature.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标进行攻击的生物。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·291 | Not on My Watch | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It's not so bad working with Etrata. She's taciturn, and she has saved my life twice today."\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target: 「跟艾庄塔一起行动也不是坏事。她不太说话，但光今天就救了我两次命。」 ～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.resname: MKM·292 | On the Job | Card Name
trans-unit.source: On the Job
trans-unit.target: 任务出动

trans-unit.resname: MKM·292 | On the Job | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn. Investigate.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物得+2/+1直到回合结束。探查。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·292 | On the Job | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Agency's detectives will eliminate the false leads. I will find the truth."\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target: 「魔调局侦探会排除错误线索。我会找到真相。」 ～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.resname: MKM·293 | Deduce | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Deduce
trans-unit.target: 常理推断

trans-unit.source: Draw a card. Investigate.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。探查。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·293 | Deduce | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Of course! It was all so obvious. I should have made the connection days ago."\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target: 「就该如此！这都再明显不过了。我几天前就该把它们都串起来。」 ～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.source:
Enchant creature
When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
{U}{U}: Shuffle enchanted creature into its owner's library.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 当CARDNAME进战场时，横置所结附的生物。 所结附的生物于其操控者的重置步骤中不能重置。 {U}{U}：将所结附之生物洗入其拥有者的牌库。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·295 | Fae Flight | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 仙儿飞空

Flash
Enchant creature
When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, enchanted creature gains hexproof until end of turn.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has flying.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 结附于生物 当CARDNAME进战场时，所结附的生物获得辟邪异能直到回合结束。 所结附的生物得+1/+0且具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·296 | Intrude on the Mind | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Intrude on the Mind
trans-unit.target: 入侵心灵

trans-unit.resname: MKM·296 | Intrude on the Mind | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Reveal the top five cards of your library and separate them into two piles. An opponent chooses one of those piles. Put that pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard. Create a 0/0 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying, then put a +1/+1 counter on it for each card put into your graveyard this way.
trans-unit.target: 展示你牌库顶的五张牌，并分成两堆。由任一对手选择其中一堆。将该堆牌置于你手上，另一堆则置入你的坟墓场。派出一个0/0无色，具飞行异能的振翼机衍生神器生物，然后每以此法将一张牌置入你的坟墓场，便在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·297 | Reenact the Crime | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Reenact the Crime
trans-unit.target: 重现罪行

trans-unit.resname: MKM·297 | Reenact the Crime | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile target nonland card in a graveyard that was put there from anywhere this turn. Copy it. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标在坟墓场中的非地牌，且须为本回合中从任何区域置入该处者。将它复制。你可以施放该复制品，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·297 | Reenact the Crime | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "As I suspected, Kylox had prepared a secret exit. But the question remains: Did he escape his assailants or was he taken against his will?"\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target: 「跟我想的一样，奇洛兹果然留了一道密门。不过谜团还没解开：他是自行逃出还是被人掳走？」 ～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.resname: MKM·298 | Unauthorized Exit | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Unauthorized Exit
trans-unit.target: 擅自脱逃

trans-unit.resname: MKM·298 | Unauthorized Exit | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Surveil 1.
trans-unit.target: 将目标非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。刺探1。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·298 | Unauthorized Exit | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Azorius will be annoyed with me for breaking out their star suspect, but what else is new."\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target: 「我带着俄佐立的头号嫌疑犯脱逃，他们看我更不顺眼，一切就老样子。」 ～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.resname: MKM·299 | It Doesn't Add Up | Card Name
trans-unit.source: It Doesn't Add Up
trans-unit.target: 事理不通

trans-unit.resname: MKM·299 | It Doesn't Add Up | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Suspect it.
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。怀疑它。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·299 | It Doesn't Add Up | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Etrata claims she has no memory of committing the murder. Somehow, I believe she's telling the truth."\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target: 「艾庄塔声称她对自己犯下这桩血案毫无记忆。我总觉得她说的是真话。」 ～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.resname: MKM·300 | Murder | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Murder
trans-unit.target: 谋杀

trans-unit.resname: MKM·300 | Murder | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标生物。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·300 | Murder | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The manner of death, the way the body was displayed, the carefully arranged guild emblems . . . someone is trying to send a message."\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target: 「离奇的死亡方式、怪异的遗体姿态、刻意摆齐的公会徽记…有人想藉此传递什么讯息。」 ～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.resname: MKM·301 | Slice from the Shadows | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Slice from the Shadows
trans-unit.target: 暗中杀出

trans-unit.resname: MKM·301 | Slice from the Shadows | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: This spell can't be countered.\nTarget creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 此咒语不能被反击。 目标生物得-X/-X直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·301 | Slice from the Shadows | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Something about Massacre Girl's brazen attack doesn't make sense. Why would the Cult of Rakdos be involved at all?"\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target: 「杀戮女郎这样明目张胆地袭击我，怎么想都不对劲。拉铎司宗派为什么一定要来蹚这趟浑水？」 ～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.resname: MKM·302 | Soul Enervation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Soul Enervation
trans-unit.target: 灵魂衰弱

trans-unit.resname: MKM·302 | Soul Enervation | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.\nWhenever one or more creature cards leave your graveyard, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 当CARDNAME进战场时，目标生物得-4/-4直到回合结束。 每当一张或数张生物牌离开你的坟墓场时，每位对手各失去1点生命且你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·303 | Anzrag's Rampage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Anzrag's Rampage
trans-unit.target: 安札格的狂愤

trans-unit.resname: MKM·303 | Anzrag's Rampage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy all artifacts you don't control, then exile the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of artifacts that were put into graveyards from the battlefield this turn. You may put a creature card exiled this way onto the battlefield. It gains haste. Return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有不由你操控的神器，然后放逐你牌库顶的X张牌，X为本回合中从战场进入坟墓场的神器数量。你可以将以此法放逐的一张生物牌放进战场。它获得敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·304 | The Chase Is On | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Chase Is On
trans-unit.target: 追逐开始

trans-unit.resname: MKM·304 | The Chase Is On | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Investigate.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标生物得+3/+0且获得先攻异能。探查。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·304 | The Chase Is On | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "If she's innocent, as she so vehemently claims, why did she run?"\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target: 「她既然如此坚称无辜，那又为什么要逃？」 ～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.resname: MKM·305 | Convenient Target | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Convenient Target
trans-unit.target: 便捷目标

trans-unit.source:
Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
{2}{R}: Return CARDNAME from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 当CARDNAME进战场时，怀疑所结附的生物。 所结附的生物得+1/+1。 {2}{R}：将CARDNAME从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·306 | Demand Answers | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Demand Answers
trans-unit.target: 索求回答

trans-unit.resname: MKM·306 | Demand Answers | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or discard a card.\nDraw two cards.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个神器或弃一张牌，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。 抓两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·306 | Demand Answers | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I suppose, from Aurelia's perspective, she was being generous by giving us one entire day to solve the most complex case in Ravnican history."\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target: 「我想，也许在欧瑞梨看来，给我们整整一天时间来破这桩拉尼卡史上最复杂的案子，已经很宽容了。」 ～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.resname: MKM·307 | Expose the Culprit | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Expose the Culprit
trans-unit.target: 暴露罪犯

trans-unit.resname: MKM·307 | Expose the Culprit | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Choose one or both —\n• Turn target face-down creature face up.\n• Exile any number of face-up creatures you control with disguise in a face-down pile, shuffle that pile, then cloak them.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项或都选～ •将目标牌面朝下的生物翻回正面。 •放逐任意数量由你操控、具伪装异能且牌面朝上的生物并放作牌面朝下的一堆，将该堆洗牌，然后匿伏这些牌。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·308 | Analyze the Pollen | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Analyze the Pollen
trans-unit.target: 分析花粉

trans-unit.resname: MKM·308 | Analyze the Pollen | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may collect evidence 8.\nSearch your library for a basic land card. If evidence was collected, instead search your library for a creature or land card. Reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 你可以搜证8，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。 从你牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌。如果已搜证，则改为从你牌库中搜寻一张生物或地牌。展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·309 | Audience with Trostani | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Audience with Trostani
trans-unit.target: 面会卓塔妮

trans-unit.resname: MKM·309 | Audience with Trostani | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Create a 0/1 green Plant creature token, then draw cards equal to the number of differently named creature tokens you control.
trans-unit.target: 派出一个0/1绿色植物衍生生物，然后抓若干牌，其数量等同于由你操控之衍生生物中名称不同者的种数。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·309 | Audience with Trostani | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "More bizarre metaphors about rot and renewal. Wildly unhelpful."\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target: 「一大堆关于腐败与新生的奇诡隐喻。毫无帮助。」 ～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.target: 狂热驱力

trans-unit.resname: MKM·310 | Fanatical Strength | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标生物得+3/+3且获得践踏异能。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·310 | Fanatical Strength | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Kaya and Kellan were attacked today! This is excellent news. Clearly we are on the trail of the true killer."\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target: 「卡娅和凯澜今天遭人袭击了！这可是大好消息。证明我们查对方向，就要找到真凶了。」 ～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.resname: MKM·311 | Coerced to Kill | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Coerced to Kill
trans-unit.target: 受迫杀人

trans-unit.resname: MKM·311 | Coerced to Kill | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nYou control enchanted creature.\nEnchanted creature has base power and toughness 1/1, has deathtouch, and is an Assassin in addition to its other types.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 你操控所结附的生物。 所结附之生物的基础力量与防御力为1/1，具有死触异能，且额外具有杀手此类别。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·311 | Coerced to Kill | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Mind control—anyone could be a threat!"\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target: 「心灵操控～谁都可能是威胁！」 ～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.resname: MKM·312 | Deadly Complication | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Deadly Complication
trans-unit.target: 夺命难题

trans-unit.resname: MKM·312 | Deadly Complication | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Choose one or both —\n• Destroy target creature.\n• Put a +1/+1 counter on target suspected creature you control. You may have it become no longer suspected.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项或都选～ •消灭目标生物。 •在目标由你操控且已遭疑的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。你可以使其不再遭疑。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·312 | Deadly Complication | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Etrata was in custody long before Teysa was killed. It's impossible that she could be the culprit."\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target: 「泰莎命案发生时，艾庄塔早已被羁押。她不可能是凶手。」 ～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.resname: MKM·313 | Insidious Roots | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 潜伏繁根

trans-unit.resname: MKM·313 | Insidious Roots | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Creature tokens you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."\nWhenever one or more creature cards leave your graveyard, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on each Plant you control.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的衍生生物具有「{T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。」 每当一张或数张生物牌离开你的坟墓场时，派出一个0/1绿色植物衍生生物，然后在每个由你操控的植物上各放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·314 | Officious Interrogation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Officious Interrogation
trans-unit.target: 官式讯问

trans-unit.resname: MKM·314 | Officious Interrogation | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {W}{U} more to cast for each target beyond the first.\nChoose any number of target players. Investigate X times, where X is the total number of creatures those players control.
trans-unit.target: 此咒语在第一个目标之外每有一个目标，便增加{W}{U}来施放。 选择任意数量的目标牌手。探查X次，X为由这些牌手操控之生物的总数量。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·314 | Officious Interrogation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Oh gods, here come the verity circles. Do the Azorius ever tire of them?"\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target: 「老天啊，他们又把真相环拿出来了。俄佐立老搞这套就不会腻吗？」 ～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.resname: MKM·315 | Warleader's Call | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Warleader's Call
trans-unit.target: 战领召令

trans-unit.source: Creatures you control get +1/+1.\nWhenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to each opponent.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物得+1/+1。 每当一个生物在你操控下进战场时，CARDNAME向每位对手各造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·315 | Warleader's Call | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I fear a war between the guilds is exactly what our killer wants. Who could stand to benefit from such destruction?"\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target: 「我担心，公会之间战火重燃正是凶手想要的结果。这般乱局当中，谁又能从中渔利？」 ～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.resname: MKM·316 | Worldsoul's Rage | Card Name

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals X damage to any target. Put up to X land cards from your hand and/or graveyard onto the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成X点伤害。将至多X张地牌从你手上和／或你坟墓场中横置放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·316 | Worldsoul's Rage | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Oba fought Realmbreaker's corruption alone, hiding her pain even from her sisters. Even after everything she's done, I can't hate her. I pity her."\n—Alquist Proft, case notes
trans-unit.target: 「欧芭独自对抗洞境树的腐化，强忍其间苦痛，就连姐妹也不曾相告。纵使她导致此等变故，我对她仍无恨意，只有惋惜。」 ～阿奎斯波费，探案笔记

trans-unit.resname: MKM·416 | Ill-Timed Explosion | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw two cards. Then you may discard two cards. When you do, CARDNAME deals X damage to each creature, where X is the greatest mana value among cards discarded this way.
trans-unit.target: 抓两张牌。然后你可以弃两张牌。当你如此作时，CARDNAME对每个生物各造成X点伤害，X为以此法所弃各牌中的最大法术力值。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·416 | Ill-Timed Explosion | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Only too late did the Agency custodians realize the device had not been inactive—it was just waiting for the right trigger.
trans-unit.target: 当魔调局保管员发现看似静止的装置仍在运行时，一切都为时已晚～它只是在等合适的爆发时机。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·417 | Kylox's Voltstrider | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kylox's Voltstrider
trans-unit.target: 奇洛兹的电行械

trans-unit.resname: MKM·417 | Kylox's Voltstrider | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Collect evidence 6: CARDNAME becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell from among cards exiled with it. If that spell would be put into a graveyard, put it on the bottom of its owner's library instead.\nCrew 2
trans-unit.target: 搜证6：CARDNAME成为神器生物直到回合结束。 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以从以其放逐的牌之中施放一个瞬间或法术咒语。 如果该咒语将进入坟墓场，则改为将它置于其拥有者的牌库底。 搭载2

trans-unit.resname: MKM·418 | Leyline of the Guildpact | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Leyline of the Guildpact
trans-unit.target: 十会盟地脉

trans-unit.resname: MKM·418 | Leyline of the Guildpact | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.\nEach nonland permanent you control is all colors.\nLands you control are every basic land type in addition to their other types.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的起手牌中包含了CARDNAME，则你可以让它在战场上来开始游戏。 每个由你操控的非地永久物均是五色。 由你操控的地均额外具有所有基本地类别。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·419 | Relive the Past | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Relive the Past
trans-unit.target: 重现过去

trans-unit.resname: MKM·419 | Relive the Past | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return up to one target artifact card, up to one target land card, and up to one target non-Aura enchantment card from your graveyard to the battlefield. They are 5/5 Elemental creatures in addition to their other types.
trans-unit.target: 将至多一张目标神器牌，至多一张目标地牌和至多一张目标非灵气结界牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。它们是5/5元素生物，且仍具有原本类别。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·419 | Relive the Past | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Many have tried to subjugate Ravnica. All have failed. All will fail."\n—Museum of Ravnican History
trans-unit.target: 「曾有许多势力想要征服拉尼卡。它们过去没办到。将来也办不到。」 ～拉尼卡历史博物馆

trans-unit.resname: MKM·420 | Treacherous Greed | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Treacherous Greed
trans-unit.target: 失忠贪欲

trans-unit.resname: MKM·420 | Treacherous Greed | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature that dealt damage this turn.\nDraw three cards. Each opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个本回合中造成过伤害的生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。 抓三张牌。每位对手各失去3点生命且你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·420 | Treacherous Greed | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Loot's easy to divide by one.
trans-unit.target: 只剩一人更易分赃。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·421 | Urgent Necropsy | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Urgent Necropsy
trans-unit.target: 紧急剖检

trans-unit.resname: MKM·421 | Urgent Necropsy | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, collect evidence X, where X is the total mana value of the permanents this spell targets.\nDestroy up to one target artifact, up to one target creature, up to one target enchantment, and up to one target planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: 搜证X，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用，X为此咒语指定作目标之各永久物的法术力值总和。 消灭至多一个目标神器，至多一个目标生物，至多一个目标结界和至多一个目标鹏洛客。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·421 | Urgent Necropsy | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Golgari can read the dead like a newspaper."\n—Taboro of the Foundway Associates
trans-unit.target: 「葛加理人解析遗体，就跟翻阅报纸一样轻松。」 ～寻路侦探社的莱努瓦梅卡

trans-unit.source: {T}, Collect evidence 3: Add one mana of any color. Put an unlock counter on CARDNAME.\nSacrifice CARDNAME: Surveil 3, then draw three cards. Activate only if CARDNAME has five or more unlock counters on it.
trans-unit.target:
{T}，搜证3：加一点任意颜色的法术力。在CARDNAME上放置一个解锁指示物。
牺牲CARDNAME：刺探3，然后抓三张牌。只能于CARDNAME上有五个或更多解锁指示物时起动。

trans-unit.source: This spell can't be countered.\nDestroy target creature or planeswalker with mana value 3 or less.
trans-unit.target: 此咒语不能被反击。 消灭目标法术力值等于或小于3的生物或鹏洛客。

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成3点伤害且你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·427 | No More Lies | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 除非目标咒语的操控者支付{3}，否则反击之。如果以此法反击该咒语，则改为将它放逐，而非置入其拥有者的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·429 | Wojek Investigator | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 沃耶克调查员

trans-unit.resname: MKM·429 | Wojek Investigator | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying, vigilance\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, investigate once for each opponent who has more cards in hand than you.
trans-unit.target: 飞行，警戒 在你的维持开始时，每有一位手牌比你多的对手，你便探查一次。

trans-unit.resname: MKM·429 | Wojek Investigator | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Well, this clearly didn't come from anyone I know..."
trans-unit.target: 「嗯，这显然不是从我认识的人身上掉下来的…」

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to twice the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.\nThe first instant or sorcery spell you cast each turn costs {3} less to cast.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME的力量和防御力各等同于你坟墓场中瞬间与法术牌之总数量的两倍。 你每回合施放的第一个瞬间或法术咒语减少{3}来施放。

trans-unit.source: Affinity for planeswalkers (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each planeswalker you control.)\nFlying, vigilance\nWhenever an opponent attacks with creatures, if two or more of those creatures are attacking you and/or planeswalkers you control, that opponent loses 3 life and you draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 鹏洛客共鸣（你每操控一个鹏洛客，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。） 飞行，警戒 每当任一对手以生物攻击时，若这些生物中有两个或更多正向你和／或由你操控的鹏洛客进行攻击，则该对手失去3点生命且你抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Vigilance, trample, ward {3}\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, put X +1/+1 counters on each creature you control, where X is the number of Elves you control. Draw a card for each Wolf you control.
trans-unit.target: 警戒，践踏，守护{3} 每当CARDNAME攻击时，在每个由你操控的生物上各放置X个+1/+1指示物，X为由你操控的妖精数量。你每操控一个狼，便抓一张牌。
